review_data.title: Unique space and host, Simön, was super awesome!
review_data.content: Celebrating their one year anniversary, Chiffon Bar has an expansive garden seating space at the front and rear side of the cafe. The interior design is a nice mix of cement, bricks, and wood. The seating is simple tables with wooden chairs and stools at...More
